creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: kneeling man with heavy outward-jutting jaw, wearing blue sleeveless long jacket over pink kimono with dark red geometric pattern; man seated on a yellow mat with floral patterned trim with pink ground, with sword resting on mat to PL of man
inscription: Posthumous name: {Jitsuyo shu_ka shinji} (Died in Dec. 27, Tenpo_2, age of 57) |  Farewell poem: Haru machite / Chiru ya namida no / [????]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Bandō Mitsugorō III
